name: get_custom_ticker
description: This endpoint can be used to generate a custom index in a certain currency.

if_include.description: The if_include parameter decides whether to generate an index removing specified exchanges, or only including the few that you require. True - if you want the ticker to be calculated using only the exchanges sent as query parameter; False - if you want the price to be calculated using all exchanges, but the ones sent as query parameter.

symbol.description: ETH where is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD).

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_ticker_per_symbol
description: Returns ticker data for specified symbol.

if_global.description: True - global; False - local. Default is True

symbol.description: ETH, where is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD, ETHEUR).

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_ticker_changes
description: Returns ticker values and price changes for specified market and symbol.

if_global.description: True - global; False - local. Default is True

symbol.description: ETH, where is valid ISO currency (ex. ETHUSD, ETHEUR).

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_short_ticker
description: Returns basic ticker denoting last and daily average price for all symbols.

if_global.description: True - global; False - local. Default is True

fiats.description: If fiats parameter is included then only the values for those fiats will be returned (ETHUSD and ETHEUR in this example). If it's missing, then the response will contain ticker values of all available fiats for ETH. (ex: 'USD,EUR').

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_all_ticker_data
description: If no query parameters are sent, then returns ticker data for every supported symbol. If fiat(s) are sent as parameters, then only the ticker for those values is sent.

if_global.description: True - global; False - local. Default is True

fiats.description: Comma separated list of ISO currency codes (ex. USD,EUR)

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
